definition: luck with the ladies/a romance/good luck
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to have luck with the ladies (idiom)

sentences.english: Raj :Oh, we should have a plan in case one of us gets lucky.
sentences.chinese: 噢，我們得制定個計劃以防萬一我們中有誰走桃花運。

sentences.english: At the same time, one of my good friend seems to have some few admirers.
sentences.chinese: 同一時間，身邊的一位好朋友的“桃花運”開始湧現。

sentences.english: You say her daughter this is to hike of what luck in adore?
sentences.chinese: 你說她女兒這是走的什麼桃花運啊？

sentences.english: The New Year blockbuster "Desire of the heart" is very interesting.
sentences.chinese: 賀歲影片《桃花運》非常有趣。

definition: to be successful in business/professional success
to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
colloquial term for 生肖[sheng1 xiao4] the animals associated with the years of a 12-year cycle
less capable than desirable (idiom); not as strong as one would wish/the spirit is willing but the flesh is weak
profits pouring in from all sides (idiom)/raking in money/bonanza
